Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Flight extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a flight in the booking system, with seat capacities for multiple seat types.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int econCap, int bizCap, int firstCap, double basePrice)
      Constructor for creating a new Flight, assigning a unique ID automatically. Useful when adding flights at runtime (not loaded from file).
      Parameters:
      flightNumber - the flight number (e.g. "BA123")
      origin - the origin airport or city
      destination - the destination airport or city
      departureDate - the date of departure
      econCap - number of Economy seats
      bizCap - number of Business seats
      firstCap - number of First class seats
      basePrice - the base price for an Economy seat

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int econCap, int bizCap, int firstCap, double basePrice, boolean deleted)
      Constructor for loading a Flight from file, specifying all fields explicitly. Updates the static counter if necessary.
      Parameters:
      id - the flight ID loaded from file
      flightNumber - the flight number
      origin - the origin
      destination - the destination
      departureDate - the date of departure
      econCap - number of Economy seats
      bizCap - number of Business seats
      firstCap - number of First class seats
      basePrice - base price for Economy seats
      deleted - whether this flight is marked as deleted

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()

    • getFlightNumber

      public String getFlightNumber()

    • getOrigin

      public String getOrigin()

    • getDestination

      public String getDestination()

    • getDepartureDate

      public LocalDate getDepartureDate()

    • getBasePrice

      public double getBasePrice()
      Returns the base price for an Economy seat on this flight. Higher classes might have multipliers.
      Returns:
      the base price

    • getEconCapacity

      public int getEconCapacity()

    • getBusinessCapacity

      public int getBusinessCapacity()

    • getFirstCapacity

      public int getFirstCapacity()

    • isDeleted

      public boolean isDeleted()

    • setDeleted

      public void setDeleted(boolean deleted)

    • getPassengers

      public Set<Customer> getPassengers()
      Returns the set of Customer passengers on this flight. This set grows each time a customer is added; removing them does not restore seat capacity automatically.
      Returns:
      the set of customers currently on this flight

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull(SeatType seatType)
      Checks if the flight is full for a given seat type.
      Parameters:
      seatType - which seat class to check
      Returns:
      true if no seats left in the specified seat type

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer customer, SeatType seatType)
      Adds a passenger to the flight in the specified seat type, decrementing that seat's capacity.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add
      seatType - the seat class (ECONOMY, BUSINESS, FIRST)
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the flight is full in that seat class

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer customer)
      Removes a passenger from the flight (does NOT restore seat capacity). If you want to restore capacity, handle it in the booking/cancellation logic.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to remove

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Returns a short descriptive string of flight details, including seat capacities and base price.
      Returns:
      a short flight detail string
